Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit a leadoff homer and scored four times
Mookie Betts also went deep and drove in four runs
Betts had a two-run homer and a two-run double among his four hits
Max Muncy extended his streak of reaching base safely to 12 plate appearances, a postseason record
Tommy Edman had three RBIs, including a tiebreaking double off starter Jose Quintana with two outs in the third inning
Kiké Hernández followed with an RBI single that made it 3-1
Betts broke open the game with a two-run double in the fourth and then a two-run homer in the sixth
Post-Match Reflections: Dodgers set to re-sign outfielder Teoscar Hernández for $66 million over 3 years, AP source says
Blue Jays, Dodgers and Red Sox among losing bidders for Juan Soto
Does Shohei Ohtani still owe his manager Dave Roberts a new Porsche?
